dcterms:description: The CookieWorld domain is a partially observable environment where an agent can access three rooms (orange, green, and blue) connected by a hallway. The agent can move in four cardinal directions and receives a reward for reaching and eating a cookie that randomly appears in the green or blue room after pressing a button in the orange room.
dcterms:title: CookieWorld

dcterms:creator: R. Toro Icarte
E. Waldie
T. Klassen
R. Valenzano
M. Castro
S. McIlraith
dcterms:description: The SymbolWorld domain is a partially observable environment where an agent can access three rooms (orange, green, and blue) connected by a hallway. The agent must navigate based on symbols and arrows placed in the rooms, receiving rewards for reaching the correct symbols.
dcterms:title: SymbolWorld
